title: FDA Recommends Booster, DC Protest
itunes:title: FDA Recommends Booster, DC Protest
description:
Guests: Angelica Lavito, Bloomberg Health reporter, Dr. Peter Lurie, President of the Center for Science in the Public Interest, Jordan Strauss, managing director in the Business Intelligence and Investigations practice of Kroll, Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick and Jodi Schneider, political news director for Bloomberg TV and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
